mapper.insert: insert into km_audit_log( id, op_type, op_action, op_action_ext1, op_action_ext2, op_action_ext3, op_action_ext4, op_message, op_timestamp op_ip, op_operator, is_op_succ )values( #{id}, #{type}, #{action}, #{actionExt1}, #{actionExt2}, #{actionExt3}, #{actionExt4}, #{message}, #{timestamp}, #{ip}, #{operator}, #{isOpSucc} )
